mixed-citation.article-title: Review of the braconid parasitoid subfamily Doryctinae (Hymenoptera, Braconidae) from the United Arab Emirates and Yemen

tp:taxon-treatment.p:
Fig. 30.
Hecabalodes radialis Tobias, 1962
, paratype, ♀ (ZISP). A . Habitus, lateral view. B . Head, front view. C . Head and mesoscutum, dorsal view. D . Head and mesosoma, lateral view. E . Mesosoma, dorsal view. F . Propodeum and first to third metasomal tergites, dorsal view.

Fig. 31.
Hecabalodes radialis Tobias, 1962
, paratype, ♀ (ZISP). A . Fore wings. B . Hind wing. C . Metasoma, dorsal view. D . Metasoma, lateral view.
